title: Here's all the Hextech Skin Shards I don't give a shit about
body:
https://image.ibb.co/d3AMBa/skins.png
share yours below.



I'm honestly considering becoming a Kha'Zix main. My situation is rapidly depleting.

replies.body:
why not the death blossom kha'zix?

also you NEED to get the gentleman cho'gath, it's faboolus
I don't have Kha'zix, not sure if I should get him. I also don't have Cho'gath. I could afford both potentially but I don't think I would play them that often.

Kha'Zix is one of my favorite champions, I mained him for a while. He is really fun imo just one shotting people and going invis and getting resets. Definitely worth buying and trying especially if you like jungle, or not.
